name: Reincarnated as a Genius Prodigy of a Prestigious Family
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: His talent was forged on the battlefield, but before he could fully develop it, he died.However, when he opened his eyes again, he realized he had been reborn as Dane Sogres, the youngest son of a prestigious count.The talent he now possessed... was not limited to just one field?!A talent in spearmanship, assassination, magic, summoning, and even swordsmanshipâ€”which he had not been able to develop fully before!He can finally nurture his endless talent in the embrace of the happy family he had al
